attributes.action: start accepting dogs up to 10kg on the plane, will be very helpful for everyone.
attributes.background:
I would like those in the UK to start accepting dogs up to 10.15 kg on the plane, it is a country with bad rules related to this.
Will be very helpful for everyone  to go in our country with our babies

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Let airlines allow pets in the airplane’s cabin to and from the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650194
